idea-plugin.name: Copy Hippo shared files
idea-plugin.description: Deploy shared hippo dependencies into tomcat shared library
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.0.6 Added support for new v11 distribution style (shared content) 1.0.5 Added option to copy log4j file to tomcat/conf directory (use -Dlog4j.configuration=file:${CATALINA_BASE}/conf/log4j.xml to enable it) 1.0.4 Config storage fixes (now within .idea folder), duplicate (shared) jar files detection and filtering
1.0.3 add option to create a file which contains project root path (used by auto export), see documentation
1.0.2 fix path to distribution.xml (windows)
1.0.1 added confirmation dialog (when deleting files), optional path to distribution.xml
1.0 initial release

action.description: Copy hippo shared files into tomcat shared directory
